source: TEXT_LUCKMA308_03298_SEQ_00<tab>Tesleen makes an effort to smile brightly.
target: TEXT_LUCKMA308_03298_SEQ_00<tab>旅立ちの宿のテスリーンは、気持ちを切り替えようとしている。

source: TEXT_LUCKMA308_03298_SEQ_01<tab>Determined not to inflict her own feelings of gloom on the patients, Tesleen suggests a meal to lighten the mood. You are duly treated to a delicious stew, which does much to restore your spirits. Even as you consider a second helping, however, a frantic carer rushes up to report that Halric has gone missing...
target: TEXT_LUCKMA308_03298_SEQ_01<tab>テスリーンたちとともに食事をしていたところ、ハルリクが行方不明だと知らされた。旅立ちの宿の「テスリーン」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKMA308_03298_SEQ_02<tab>Time being of the essence, Alisaie suggests assigning search areas, and Tesleen claims the territory to the east. Alisaie herself volunteers to take the north and the west, leaving you to scour everything to the south.
target: TEXT_LUCKMA308_03298_SEQ_02<tab>テスリーンと話した。旅立ちの宿周辺の「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EAB0201 /var>」で見渡し、ハルリクを探そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKMA308_03298_SEQ_03<tab>You find no sign of the missing Halric. There are, however, still plenty of other places to the south of the Inn where a young boy might wander unseen...
target: TEXT_LUCKMA308_03298_SEQ_03<tab>ハルリクは見つからなかった。旅立ちの宿周辺の、2箇所目の「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EAB0301 /var>」で見渡し、ハルリクを探そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKMA308_03298_SEQ_04<tab>As you scan your surroundings in search of Halric, you stray into the path of a ravenous sin eater. But the predator is soon made to regret its choice of prey, and you resume seeking the Inn's wayward patient.
target: TEXT_LUCKMA308_03298_SEQ_04<tab>ハルリクは見つからず、罪喰いが襲い掛かってきた。旅立ちの宿周辺の、3箇所目の「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EAB0401 /var>」で見渡し、ハルリクを探そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKMA308_03298_SEQ_05<tab>A short while later, you stumble into a breathless Alisaie, whose own search has proven similarly fruitless. As you wonder where to look next, a large sin eater flies overhead, and you decide to give chase in the hope that the creature might lead you to your quarry...as indeed it does. Alas, you arrive too late to prevent Tesleen from sacrificing herself to save the boy, and so bear witness to her horrifying transformation. The road back to the Inn is a somber one indeed...
target: TEXT_LUCKMA308_03298_SEQ_05<tab>ハルリクを見つけたが、テスリーンが罪喰いの魔の手にかかった。旅立ちの宿の「アリゼー」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKMA308_03298_SEQ_06<tab>With Alisaie still reeling from the loss of her friend, it falls to you to console the Inn's surviving carers.
target: TEXT_LUCKMA308_03298_SEQ_06<tab>アリゼーと話した。旅立ちの宿の世話人たちと話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKMA308_03298_SEQ_07<tab>Tesleen's colleagues are understandably devastated by the news of her fate, but they seem comforted by your stoic presence nonetheless. This does little to assuage your guilt at failing to prevent the atrocity, however. You wonder what Halric must be feeling beneath that silent mask...
target: TEXT_LUCKMA308_03298_SEQ_07<tab>世話人たちと話した。旅立ちの宿の「ハルリク」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKMA308_03298_SEQ_08<tab>As before, your attempts to engage the boy are met with a blank stare and nothing more. This sudden tragedy has cast a pall of hopelessness over the Inn and its residents─everywhere you turn, you see faces etched with grief and sadness.
target: TEXT_LUCKMA308_03298_SEQ_08<tab>ハルリクと話した。相変わらず反応はなかった。あまりに突然テスリーンを失った悲しみに、旅立ちの宿は沈んでいる……。
TEXT_LUCKMA308_03298_TODO_05<tab>旅立ちの宿の世話人たちと話す
TEXT_LUCKMA308_03298_ALISAIE_000_000<tab>……渡してあげてくれて、ありがとう。

source: TEXT_LUCKMA308_03298_TESLEEN_000_010<tab>Well, nothing is going to happen for a little while yet, so let's see if we can't lighten the mood. We don't want our gloomy faces worrying the patients!
target:
TEXT_LUCKMA308_03298_TESLEEN_000_010<tab>さてと、今すぐに何かってわけでもないんだし、
切り替えていかないと、患者さんたちも不安になっちゃうよね！

source: TEXT_LUCKMA308_03298_TESLEEN_000_011<tab>I think it's time for that welcome meal, don't you? Take a seat, and I'll make us a nice stew!
target:
TEXT_LUCKMA308_03298_TESLEEN_000_011<tab>次は、みんなのご飯の支度っ！
もちろんあなたの分も作るから、一緒に食べよう！

source: TEXT_LUCKMA308_03298_JOURNEYSHEADNURSE_000_020<tab>This is my fault. The patients were acting strangely, and I let it distract me...
target:
TEXT_LUCKMA308_03298_JOURNEYSHEADNURSE_000_020<tab>ほかの患者たちの様子が急におかしくなって、
そっちに気を取られていたら……。
本当に、ごめんなさい……！

source: TEXT_LUCKMA308_03298_TESLEEN_000_060<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, Alisaie─we have to go look for Halric!
target:
TEXT_LUCKMA308_03298_TESLEEN_000_060<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、アリゼー！
お願い、一緒にハルリクを探して……！

source: TEXT_LUCKMA308_03298_TESLEEN_000_061<tab>I don't know what's gotten into him, but if he's wandering out there alone...
target:
TEXT_LUCKMA308_03298_TESLEEN_000_061<tab>理由はわからないけど、外に出ちゃったなら、
獣や罪喰いに襲われる可能性もある……。
とにかく、早く見つけないと！

source: TEXT_LUCKMA308_03298_ALISAIE_000_062<tab>We'll assign search areas and split up. Any idea where he might be headed?
target:
TEXT_LUCKMA308_03298_ALISAIE_000_062<tab>わかってるわ、手分けしましょう。
行き先とかに、心当たりはないの？

source: TEXT_LUCKMA308_03298_TESLEEN_000_063<tab>No, he's never done anything like this before. But it can't be a coincidence that the other patients are suddenly so agitated. They can sense something...
target:
TEXT_LUCKMA308_03298_TESLEEN_000_063<tab>そういうのは、何も……。
ただ、ほかの患者さんも、なんだかザワザワしてる。
彼らにしかわからない事態が起きてるのかも……。

source: TEXT_LUCKMA308_03298_TESLEEN_000_064<tab>In any case, let's keep the search close to the Inn. Halric isn't very sure on his feet, so he won't have gone far. I'll search the east side!
target:
TEXT_LUCKMA308_03298_TESLEEN_000_064<tab>ひとまず、いなくなってから時間はさほど経ってないから、
宿の近くを探してみよう！
私、東の方から回ってみる……！
TEXT_LUCKMA308_03298_TESLEEN_000_065<tab>お願い……無事でいて、ハルリク……！

source: TEXT_LUCKMA308_03298_ALISAIE_000_066<tab>I'll cover the north and west, then. You take everything from here to the south!
target:
TEXT_LUCKMA308_03298_ALISAIE_000_066<tab>それじゃあ、私は北西の方に行ってみるわ。
あなたは、南側を……頼んだわよ！

source: TEXT_LUCKMA308_03298_SYSTEM_000_070<tab>You see no sign of Halric. Maybe he went further west...
target:
TEXT_LUCKMA308_03298_SYSTEM_000_070<tab>ハルリクの姿は見えない。
ほかの場所をあたってみよう。

source: TEXT_LUCKMA308_03298_SYSTEM_000_080<tab>You scan your surroundings in search of Halric...and suddenly find yourself under attack!
target:
TEXT_LUCKMA308_03298_SYSTEM_000_080<tab>ハルリクの姿は見えない。
……罪喰いが襲い掛かってきた！
TEXT_LUCKMA308_03298_VOYNE_000_105<tab>足りた……足りた……新しい…………足りた……。

source: TEXT_LUCKMA308_03298_ALISAIE_000_131<tab>I'm sorry, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I tried to tell the carers what happened, but...
target:
TEXT_LUCKMA308_03298_ALISAIE_000_131<tab>ごめん、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>……。
世話人のみんなには、事情、話しておいたから……。

source: TEXT_LUCKMA308_03298_ALISAIE_000_132<tab>...I can't be the shoulder they lean on. Not like this.
target: TEXT_LUCKMA308_03298_ALISAIE_000_132<tab>少しだけ……あとのこと、頼らせて…………。

source: TEXT_LUCKMA308_03298_CASSANA_000_141<tab>Tesleen was always so cheery with the patients, telling them not to be scared, that there wouldn't be any pain...
target:
TEXT_LUCKMA308_03298_CASSANA_000_141<tab>テスリーンは、いつも患者たちに明るく話しかけてたわ。
怖いことも、痛いことも、ないんだよって伝えるみたいにね。

source: TEXT_LUCKMA308_03298_CASSANA_000_142<tab>Of all the people in the world to suffer such a fate!
target:
TEXT_LUCKMA308_03298_CASSANA_000_142<tab>その彼女が……どうして……
そんな終わり方、しなくちゃならなかったの……！

source: TEXT_LUCKMA308_03298_CASSANA_000_143<tab>Oh, Tesleen... You thought only of others...and this was your reward.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMA308_03298_CASSANA_000_143<tab>あなたがみんなにそう願ったように……
私たちだって、あなたに苦しんでほしくなかったわよ。
テスリーン……。

source: TEXT_LUCKMA308_03298_WILLFORT_000_144<tab>I imagine you're just as shocked as the rest of us, so I appreciate what you're doing here.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMA308_03298_WILLFORT_000_144<tab>……君たちも、ショックだろうに。
こうして気遣ってくれて、ありがとう。

source: TEXT_LUCKMA308_03298_WILLFORT_000_145<tab>Me? I can barely... I don't have the words. Without a body, we can't even give her a proper burial! And she <var 1A 02 /var>cared<var 1A 01 /var> about that sort of thing─about giving people the chance to say their good-byes...
target:
TEXT_LUCKMA308_03298_WILLFORT_000_145<tab>正直なところ、言葉にならないよ……。
人でなくなってしまえば、墓を作って弔うこともできない。
それを一番さみしがったのは、テスリーン……君だったのに。

source: TEXT_LUCKMA308_03298_WILLFORT_000_146<tab>We'll manage, somehow. Someone needs to care for the patients. We're all they've got...
target:
TEXT_LUCKMA308_03298_WILLFORT_000_146<tab>ともかく、一度おちつくよ。
……私たちはまだ、患者たちの命を預かったままなのだから。

source: TEXT_LUCKMA308_03298_SYSTEM_000_151<tab>Halric is as unresponsive as ever. He stands motionless, staring up into the sky where the sin eaters made their escape...
target:
TEXT_LUCKMA308_03298_SYSTEM_000_151<tab>ハルリクは、相変わらず反応がない。
罪喰いが飛び去って行った方向を、ただ見つめている……。
